about.title: About
about.content: Typescript certified developer and certified GCP associate. I have experience working with Javascript, React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, Nestjs, databases both relational (SQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL) o non relational (MongoDB). I have worked with scalable applications for global companies and also working with individual clients and small projects.

education.name: Universidad de San Carlos de Guatemala
education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science - Bachelor of Science - BS

jobs.title: Production Engineer Fellow
jobs.description:
Learned and practiced PE skills.
Recieved mentorship from Meta PEs.
jobs.skills: Production Engineering, Python, Linux, Systems Design, Debugging, Problem Solving, Attention to Detail, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD), Git

jobs.title: Applications Developer
jobs.description: In charge of developing full web applications using technologies as Reactjs, NextJs, NodeJs, Typescript, etc
jobs.skills: TypeScript, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery, Engineering, Google Cloud Platform, Jest, Next.js, Node.js, GitHub Actions, Micro Frontends, Attention to Detail, Debugging, Webpack, Microfrontends (MFEs)

jobs.title: Fullstack web applications developer intern
jobs.description: Completed a series of modules that included the development of applications such as todos, photo albums, budget managers and others to apply different technologies and testing libraries.
jobs.skills: Apps Testing, styled-components, Containerization, NestJS, Jest, Git, CSS , Babel.js, GitHub, Soluciones web, Kubernetes, Attention to Detail, Continous Integration and Continous Deployment (CI/CD), Anal, Debugging, HTML, Problem Solving, Webpack, Redux.js, SQL, Docker, Bitbucket, PostgreSQL

jobs.title: Assistant Content Manager
jobs.description: Worked mainly with CMSs such as WordPress or Gazela, where I had create and update web pages and their new entries.
jobs.skills: Capacidad de análisis, Resolución de problemas, Atención al detalle, Soluciones web

jobs.title: Junior Software Developer
